root.name: Deathsmiles II: Makai no Merry Christmas
root.description: Deathsmiles II: Makai no Merry Christmas is a horizontal bullet hell shoot 'em up developed by Cave and released in 2009. It is the sequel to Deathsmiles, and Cave's first shoot 'em up to be rendered in polygonal 3D. Deathsmiles IIX: Makai no Merry Christmas An updated Xbox 360 version called Deathsmiles IIX: Makai no Merry Christmas was released May 27 2010. It added a number of new features, including two new modes: Xbox 360 Mode and Arrange Mode.
